name: Eggstraordinary Adventure (lroh)
description:
An adventure across time, a game with a lot of pop culture references and multiple endings.This game isnt easy! Dont fool yourself. But in the end its worth it!The main focus of the game was to be a fun experience with funny dialog. 

Since its a Miziziziz GameJam entry the game has some bugs and we couldnt finish it on time with all the designed levels and animations.

Make sure to find the hidden eggs to get the good ending! If you get to the end without it you go back to the begining!

Please DONT play on FULLSCREEN


References:

  1. Lord of the rings
  2. Fast and Furious
  3. Google Chrome
  4. Viva la dirty league
  5. Neil Armstrong
  6. Covid
